message: Let's split the money 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer that allows us both to benefit.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer. We both get a good amount, and it's closer to an even split.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm offering you 42 dollars.  That's better than the 40 I offered last round, and the money is only going to be worth less if we wait any longer.
